segments.text: Please take me to the Honging Hotel .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Please get in . I'm glad to serve you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you get there in twenty minutes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will take half an hour to get to the hotel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am in a hurry . Please take a shortcut . I have a friend waiting for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , I promise we'll get there in twenty minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
